It's fun to work at a company where people truly believe in what they are doing!

Job Description:

The Deal Attribution Analyst will work with Sales Finance to calculate the quarterly quota attainment for Sales Reps.

Job Responsibilities:
  • Serve as primary point of contact for sales reps with questions regarding their sales bonus
  • Liaise with Finance Operations, Sales Ops, HR, and Comp contacts to resolve issues with inputs used to calculate sales bonuses. Work with our partners in a positive, productive way that encourages collaboration.
  • Use Google Sheets and query language to access large data files and databases to locate deal booking information and help troubleshoot deal ownership disputes
  • Identify common problems and concerns across sales reps and help brainstorm potential solutions
  • Help enhance and maintain customer relationship management tools on behalf of Sales team
  • Help enhance and maintain customer service procedures for Sales Operations team
Minimum Requirements:
  • BS/BA degree
  • 2-3 years of experience in customer service or operations
  • Familiar with SQL or another database query language
  • Fluent in MS Excel
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Proven ability to maintain confidentiality
  • Ability to work for any US employer (we do not provide visa sponsorship) Preferred Requirements:
  • Experience in sales operations or sales compensation
  • Attention to detail with the ability to effectively multitask and work independently
  • Proven ability to turn frustrated customers into happy customers
  • Forensic skills, ie, ability to analyze data pieces and identify best solution given business and systems context
If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!
